Version: %1$s
Developers: %2$s

EnchantNet is a multiplayer tool for Minecraft: Java Edition on Android. It works with all Android launchers and does not require any multiplayer mods.
It is easy to use and interoperates with HMCL (Terracotta) and PCL2 CE - these are key advantages of this app.
Invite code has been copied to the clipboard
Backup server address has been copied to the clipboard

To ensure EnchantNet’s online features work properly, we need the following permissions:

Foreground service (keeps the network connection active)
Device connection identifier (used to create or join rooms)
Notifications (to display connection status)
Ignore battery optimizations (prevents the system from interrupting the connection in the background)
VPN permissions (to create a connection)

Please grant the app these permissions.

Instructions:
 - Click "Start Scan" to scan the game port
 - Open the game and turn on the "Open to LAN" option in the game settings
 - Wait for a moment and the invite code will be automatically copied. If it is not automatically copied, you can also go to the notification or copy it manually in the software
 - Send the invite code to your friends
Notes: - This software supports offline accounts

Instructions:
 - Get an invitation code from the room host and enter it in the input box
 - Click "Join Room" and wait patiently
 - After it shows that you have joined the room, start the game, refresh in multiplayer menu, find the automatically detected room and join it
Notes: - This software supports offline accounts
 - This software supports invite codes from HMCL (Terracotta) and PCL2 CE
 - When joining the game using the backup server address, offline accounts are not supported. Please solve this problem yourself
